info.author: Denis Mishchishin
info.description:
OUTLINE
=======
`multiprocessing` based framework and syntax that uses codeblocks.py as an atomization unit

Aimed on longer than short running tasks that uses resources (file readers, crawlers)

FEATURES
========

* flask like application stack (flask is an inspiration for this project and temporarily is a requirement)
* multiprocessing.Manager stack (context is a ready to use multiprocessing.Manager and a current_process() context store)
* multiprocessing.Pool for tasks
* save/restore (eg. pause) running pool
* signalsets for customization


WARNING
=======

Currently this is a POC. See `test/test_concept.py` for rough guideline
